A children's uprising where they take over the government and make decisions based on their values and vision for a better world.
A fictional story where children are given the power to control technology and use it to create a utopian society.
A historical event where children led a revolution against an oppressive regime and overthrew the leaders.
A thought experiment where children are given the opportunity to design and build their own communities from scratch, with no adult interference.
A satirical take on the idea of children ruling the world, where they use their naivety and innocence to manipulate the adults and achieve their own goals.
